table.name: compartment_pi_join
table.description: This table associates the equipment compartments with the packaged items. In GC3 users have the flexibility of defining the compatible Packaged items for a compartment.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The equipment group ID for the compartment to which the packaged item is linked.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_NUM
columns.description: Compartment number for the compartment to which the packaged item.

columns.name: PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: The packaged item that is linked to the compartment.
